input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product features and product specification information.

Product specification:
DG Performance 04-4103 - RCM Steel Exhaust (Black) for Yamaha Tri-Moto 225 (1983-1986 )

Product features:
RCM - Great performance and phenominal value!
The midpipe diameter and gets larger as it gets to the muffler body to help scavenge exhaust gases from the engine and increase power
Better throttle response and a smoother power delivery
RCM stands for Reverse Cone Megaphone.
Steel construction

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This DG Performance RCM Steel Exhaust is the perfect way to give your Yamaha Tri-Moto 225 that extra kick. Made from steel, this exhaust system is designed to withstand the toughest conditions and provide you with years of reliable performance. The reverse cone megaphone design not only looks great, but it also helps to improve your bike's power and torque. And the best part? The midpipe diameter gets larger as it gets to the muffler body, helping to scavenge exhaust gases from the engine and increase power even further. So if you're looking for a durable and effective exhaust system that will give you better throttle response and a smoother power delivery, look no further than the DG Performance RCM Steel Exhaust.
input_text.Response B: This DG Performance Steel Exhaust is the perfect addition to your Yamaha Tri-Moto 225. The exhaust system is made of high-quality steel and is designed to last. The midpipe diameter is larger than the stock unit, which helps to increase power and provides a smoother power delivery. The exhaust is also equipped with a reverse cone megaphone, which gives it a unique and aggressive sound. The installation is easy and can be done without any welding. It comes with a one-year warranty and is made in the USA.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
